summary: Leading a team of four equity researchers with a focus on absolute return ideas. Proven track record in investment idea generation, communication, and mentoring. Strong academic history with a Bachelor of Arts from the University of Cambridge and a CFA Charter achieved in 18 months. I enjoy exploring the world and learning something new every day.

Writing daily and quarterly summaries for clients and media, as well as holding investment conferences and workshops, speaker in public investment forums and events
